title: Negativity Bias
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we discuss whether or not we view our minds as being inherently negative. While we're constantly fighting to better understand the perceptions of the world around us, are we also battling a built-in system that is against us?
